name: Marcho Partners
slogan: Global public impact tech investment fund
description:
We are building a global technology investment fund focusing on investing in publicly-traded tech companies based outside of the US and China (ie in all other countries... Europe, Canada, Middle East, India, S America, Japan, SE Asia, etc).

Our first office is located in London, and we are actively recruiting for our Paris office also.

team.name: Carl Anderson
team.bioHtml: Founder and CIO of Marcho Partners -- a global public equities technology fund.

jobs.title: Investment analyst
jobs.description: The investment analyst will work on the investment team to help source, diligence, and debate investment ideas with the rest of the team.  The candidate does not need to have a finance or investment background, but needs to have a high-level of intellectual horsepower and the ability to make and support investment recommendations based on where he/she thinks the world will be in the future.
